cards.rules_text:
When Abyssal Nightcaster enters, each player exiles a card from their hand.
When Abyssal Nightcaster dies, you may play cards you don't own from exile this turn.
When Adept Electromancer enters, scry 2, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's an instant or sorcery card, put it into your hand.
Shuffle your library, then exile cards from the top until you exile an artifact card. You may put that card into your hand. Shuffle the rest back into your library.

Whenever Akoum Pathfinder attacks, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.
Other Goblins you control get +1/+0 and have haste.

Haste
{R}: Akoum Rockhurler gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever Akoum Rockhurler attacks, you may sacrifice a land. If you do, put two +1/+1 counters on Akoum Rockhurler.

Menace
Whenever Akoum Trailblazer deals combat damage to a player, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
Whenever you discard a card, you may pay {R}. If you do, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.
Create two 3/1 red and white Goblin Soldier creature tokens with haste. Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice a Goblin. If you do, Alenian Boom Squad deals 2 damage to any target.
